greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the first digit to appear n times in succession in a power of 11.
mathematica: z = Split[IntegerDigits[x]]; a = Length /@ z; b = Max[a];
program: a, s = 1, tuple(str(i)*n for i in range(10))
results.author: _V. Raman_, Aug 22 2012
ext: a(10)-a(13) added by _V. Raman_, Apr 30 2012, in correspondence with A215731.
